Package it.trvi.vendorsftpconnection

Class SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor

java.lang.Object
it.trvi.vendorsftpconnection.MessageExchanger
it.trvi.vendorsftpconnection.SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor
extends MessageExchanger
A Message Exchanger used to send and receive messages to and from the Amazon Vendor server through the SFTP protocol.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor​(java.lang.String settingsFilePath, java.lang.String passphraseDown, java.lang.String passphraseUp)
    It establishes an upload and download connection with the Amazon server using the settings contained in the file in settingsFilePath and the default host and port for Europe.
    SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor​(java.lang.String settingsFilePath, java.lang.String passphraseDown, java.lang.String passphraseUp, java.lang.String host, int port)
    It establishes an upload and download connection with the Amazon server using the settings contained in the file in settingsFilePath and the specified address and port of the SFTP server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()
    If the underlying communication is connection-oriented, it closes the connection.
    java.lang.String receive()
    If there's a message waiting to be received, it immediately returns it.
    void send​(java.lang.String msg)
    Sends a message.
    void send​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String destinationFileName)
    Version of send() in which the name of the file uploaded to the remote server can be chosen, useful only for testing.

    Methods inherited from class it.trvi.vendorsftpconnection.MessageExchanger

    waitForMessage, waitForMessageForMilliseconds

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor

      public SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor​(java.lang.String settingsFilePath, java.lang.String passphraseDown, java.lang.String passphraseUp) throws ConnectionException, java.io.IOException
      It establishes an upload and download connection with the Amazon server using the settings contained in the file in settingsFilePath and the default host and port for Europe.
      Parameters:
      settingsFilePath - is the path to the settings file
      passphraseDown - is the passphrase for the private keys for the download connection
      passphraseUp - is the passphrase for the private keys for the upload connection
      Throws:
      ConnectionException - if an error occurs while establishing the connection
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the settings file

    • SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor

      public SFTPBasedMessageExchangerForAmazonVendor​(java.lang.String settingsFilePath, java.lang.String passphraseDown, java.lang.String passphraseUp, java.lang.String host, int port) throws ConnectionException, java.io.IOException
      It establishes an upload and download connection with the Amazon server using the settings contained in the file in settingsFilePath and the specified address and port of the SFTP server.
      Parameters:
      settingsFilePath - is the path to the settings file
      passphraseDown - is the passphrase for the private keys for the download connection
      passphraseUp - is the passphrase for the private keys for the upload connection
      host - is the address of the SFTP server
      port - is the port of the SFTP server
      Throws:
      ConnectionException - if an error occurs while establishing the connection
      java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the settings file

  • Method Details

    • send

      public void send​(java.lang.String msg) throws MessageForwardingException
      Description copied from class: MessageExchanger
      Sends a message.
      Specified by:
      send in class MessageExchanger
      Parameters:
      msg - contains the message to be sent
      Throws:
      MessageForwardingException - if an error prevents the sending of the message

    • send

      public void send​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String destinationFileName) throws MessageForwardingException
      Version of send() in which the name of the file uploaded to the remote server can be chosen, useful only for testing.
      Parameters:
      msg - contains the message to be sent
      destinationFileName - the name of the file containing the message that will be uploaded to the remote server
      Throws:
      MessageForwardingException - if an error prevents the sending of the message

    • receive

      public java.lang.String receive() throws MessageReceptionException, java.util.NoSuchElementException
      Description copied from class: MessageExchanger
      If there's a message waiting to be received, it immediately returns it. Otherwise, it throws a NoSuchElemetException.
      Specified by:
      receive in class MessageExchanger
      Returns:
      the received message
      Throws:
      MessageReceptionException - if an error prevents the sending of the message
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if there's no message waiting to be received

    • close

      public void close()
      Description copied from class: MessageExchanger
      If the underlying communication is connection-oriented, it closes the connection. Otherwise, it does nothing. If the connection is already closed, it does nothing.
      Specified by:
      close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in class MessageExchanger
